incidentOwner.title: Incident owner
incidentOwner.description: A reference to the `ClaimContact` that represents the owner of this incident

insured.title: Insured
insured.description: A reference to the `ClaimContact` that represents the insured

mainContact.title: Main contact
mainContact.description: A reference to the `ClaimContact` that represents the main contact for this claim

reporter.title: Main contact
reporter.description: A reference to the `ClaimContact` that represents the person who reported this claim

witnesses.title: Witnesses
witnesses.description: A list of witnesses relevant to this claim

CEDEX.title: CEDEX
CEDEX.description: The CEDEX bureau of the address. Only applicable in certain countries.

addressLine1Kanji.title: Address line 1 kanji
addressLine1Kanji.description: The kanji version of the first line of the address. Only applicable in certain countries.

addressLine2Kanji.title: Address line 2 kanji
addressLine2Kanji.description: The kanji version of the second line of the address. Only applicable in certain countries.

cityKanji.title: City kanji
cityKanji.description: The kanji version of the city of the address. Only applicable in certain countries.

companyNameKanji.title: Company name kanji
companyNameKanji.description: The kanji version of the name of the company represented by this `ClaimContact`. Only applicable for a `ClaimContact` that represents a company.

doctorSpecialty.title: Doctor specialty
doctorSpecialty.description: The doctor's specialty. Only applicable for a `ClaimContact` that represent a doctor.

firstNameKanji.title: First name kanji
firstNameKanji.description: The kanji version of the first name of the person represented by this `ClaimContact`. Only applicable for a `ClaimContact` that represents a person.

lastNameKanji.title: Last name kanji
lastNameKanji.description: The kanji version of the last name of the person represented by this `ClaimContact`. Only applicable for a `ClaimContact` that represents a person.

medicalLicense.title: Medical license
medicalLicense.description: The doctor's medical license number. Only applicable for a `ClaimContact` that represent a doctor.

particle.title: Particle
particle.description: The particle portion of the name of the person represented by this `ClaimContact`. Only applicable for a `ClaimContact` that represents a person.

covTermOrder.title: Coverage term order
covTermOrder.description: The order of this coverage term relative to other terms on the same coverage. Used to present the terms in sorted order.

covTermPattern.title: Coverage term pattern
covTermPattern.description: The specific pattern for this term. The pattern defines the type of value that the term carries.

modelAggregation.title: Model aggregation
modelAggregation.description: Describes how aggregate limits are determined for this coverage term

modelRestriction.title: Model restriction
modelRestriction.description: A sub-categorization of the term that further refines what the model type on the `covTermPattern` applies to in the context of this term

claimant.title: Claimant
claimant.description: A reference to the `ClaimContact` that represents the claimant for this exposure

incidentOwner.title: Incident owner
incidentOwner.description: A reference to the `ClaimContact` that represents the owner of the incident

incidentOwner.title: Incident owner
incidentOwner.description: A reference to the `ClaimContact` that represents the owner of the incident

injuredPerson.title: Injured person
injuredPerson.description: A reference to the `ClaimContact` that represents the injured person

primaryDoctor.title: Primary doctor
primaryDoctor.description: A reference to the `ClaimContact` that represents the primary doctor that treated the injury

incidentOwner.title: Incident owner
incidentOwner.description: A reference to the `ClaimContact` that represents the owner of this incident

agent.title: Agent
agent.description: A reference to the `ClaimContact` that represents the agent for this policy

coveredParties.title: Covered parties
coveredParties.description: A list of references to `ClaimContact` elements that represent covered parties on this policy

excludedParties.title: Excluded parties
excludedParties.description: A list of references to `ClaimContact` elements that represent excluded parties on this policy

insured.title: Insured
insured.description: A reference to the `ClaimContact` that represents the primary insured party for this policy

incidentOwner.title: Incident owner
incidentOwner.description: A reference to the `ClaimContact` that represents the owner of this incident

incidentOwner.title: Incident owner
incidentOwner.description: A reference to the `ClaimContact` that represents the owner of this incident

airbagsDeployed.title: Airbags deployed
airbagsDeployed.description: A `true` value indicates that the vehicle's airbags were deployed

collision.title: Collision
collision.description: A `true` value indicates that the vehicle was involved in a collision

collisionPoint.title: Collision point
collisionPoint.description: The point of first impact during the collision

driver.title: Driver
driver.description: A reference to the `ClaimContact` that represents the driver of the vehicle

equipmentFailure.title: Equipment failure
equipmentFailure.description: A `true` value indicates that equipment failure was involved in this loss

incidentOwner.title: Incident owner
incidentOwner.description: A reference to the `ClaimContact` that represents the owner of the vehicle, if this incident represents a third-party loss

passengers.title: Excluded parties
passengers.description: A list of references to `ClaimContact` elements that represent passengers in the vehicle

propertyDamageDescription.title: Property description
propertyDamageDescription.description: A description of the property that was damaged

safeToDrive.title: Operable
safeToDrive.description: A `true` value indicates that the vehicle is still operable

theft.title: Theft
theft.description: A `true` value indicates that the vehicle was stolen

totalLoss.title: Total loss
totalLoss.description: A `true` value indicates that the vehicle is a total loss

vehicleDirection.title: Vehicle direction
vehicleDirection.description: The direction the vehicle was traveling at impact

vehicleParked.title: Vehicle parked
vehicleParked.description: A `true` value indicates that the vehicle was parked at the time of the incident

vehicleType.title: Vehicle type
vehicleType.description: A description of the type of possession of the vehicle, such as `owned`, `leased`, or `rented`

vehicleUseReason.title: Vehicle use reason
vehicleUseReason.description: The reason for the vehicle's use

Witness.title: Witness
Witness.description: Details of the contact who witnessed an incident

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: A reference to the `ClaimContact` that represents the person who witnessed the loss

perspective.title: Perspective
perspective.description: Details of the perspective that the witness observed the loss from

position.title: Position
position.description: Where the witness was when the loss occurred

statementObtained.title: Statement obtained
statementObtained.description: A `true` value indicates that a statement was obtained from the witness
